# Track my case UI

[![repo standards badge](https://img.shields.io/endpoint?labelColor=231f20&color=005ea5&style=for-the-badge&label=MoJ%20Compliant&url=https%3A%2F%2Foperations-engineering-reports.cloud-platform.service.justice.gov.uk%2Fapi%2Fv1%2Fcompliant_public_repositories%2Fendpoint%2Ftemplate-repository&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://operations-engineering-reports.cloud-platform.service.justice.gov.uk/public-github-repositories.html#template-repository)

Frontend for the **Track my case** service. This is an Express + TypeScript application using Nunjucks and GOV.UK Design System components.

Generated from the [Data Platform App Template](https://github.com/ministryofjustice/data-platform-app-template), based on [HMPPS TypeScript Template](https://github.com/ministryofjustice/hmpps-template-typescript) â€” with authentication and HMPPS integrations removed for simplicity.

---

## Prerequisites

- Node.js `>=22`
- npm `>=10`
- Docker (for local container-based execution)

---

## ğŸ”§ Quick Start

To start the app locally in development mode (with hot reloading):

```bash
npm install
npm run start:dev
```

Visit: [http://localhost:9999](http://localhost:9999)

## Running in Docker

```bash
docker compose up --build
```

---

## Running the tests

**NOTE: Testing is limited as the base template is still being built.**

```bash
npm test
```

## Code style

- Code formatting: Prettier
- Linting: ESLint (with MoJ shared config)
- Git hooks: Husky

Format the codebase using:

```bash
npm run lint-fix
```

---

## ğŸ“¦ Tech Stack

- [Express.js](https://expressjs.com/)
- [Nunjucks](https://mozilla.github.io/nunjucks/)
- [govuk-frontend](https://github.com/alphagov/govuk-frontend)
- [@ministryofjustice/frontend](https://github.com/ministryofjustice/moj-frontend)
- `TypeScript`, `esbuild`, `Jest`, `Prettier`, `ESLint`
- `esbuild` for fast bundling
- `jest` for testing

---

## ğŸ“ Folder Structure

```text
.
â”œâ”€â”€ server/                  # All backend logic
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ app.ts               # Express app setup
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ routes/              # Route modules (e.g. index, case)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ middleware/          # Express middlewares (e.g. async, error handling)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ views/               # Nunjucks templates
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ layout/               # Base layouts (public, citizen-authenticated, etc.)
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ pages/                # Page templates (e.g. dashboard, case selection)
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ components/           # UI macro components (e.g. actionCard)
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ utils/               # Utility helpers
â”‚
â”œâ”€â”€ assets/                 # SCSS, JS and static assets
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ scss/               # Stylesheets (GOV.UK + custom)
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ js/                 # JavaScript for frontend interactions
â”‚
â”œâ”€â”€ docs/                   # Internal project documentation
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ views-structure.md
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ components.md
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ running-locally.md
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ known-limitations.md
â”‚
â”œâ”€â”€ dist/                   # Compiled assets and templates (not committed)
â””â”€â”€ README.md
```

## ğŸ“˜ Documentation

- [ğŸ§© Components](docs/components.md): reusable UI macros (e.g. `actionCard`)
- [ğŸ“ Views structure](docs/views-structure.md): Nunjucks layout and organization

- [âš ï¸ Known limitations](docs/known-limitations.md): areas for future improvement

---

## ğŸ§© UI Components

Reusable macro-based components live in `server/views/components`.

Each macro (e.g. `actionCard`) is:

- Defined in `macro.njk`
- Accompanied by custom SCSS in `assets/scss/components/`
- Documented in [`docs/components.md`](docs/components.md)

---

## ğŸŒ Environment Variables

| Name             | Required | Description                                       |
| ---------------- | -------- | ------------------------------------------------- |
| `BUILD_NUMBER`   | âœ…       | Build identifier (e.g. GitHub Actions run number) |
| `GIT_REF`        | âœ…       | Git commit SHA                                    |
| `GIT_BRANCH`     | âœ…       | Git branch name                                   |
| `PRODUCT_ID`     | âœ…       | Internal product identifier                       |
| `SESSION_SECRET` | âœ…       | Session encryption key                            |
| `NO_HTTPS`       | âŒ       | Disable HTTPS redirects for dev usage             |
| `REDIS_ENABLED`  | âŒ       | Enable Redis for session storage                  |

For local use, you can set these in the `docker-compose.yml` environment block or export them directly into your shell.
